state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant browser
    participant server
    participant spa

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/notes
    activate server
    server-->>browser: HTML document
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.css
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the CSS file
    deactivate server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.js
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser starts executing the JavaScript code that fetches the JSON from the server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [{ "content": "HTML is easy", "date": "2023-1-1" }, ... ]
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function that renders the notes

    browser->>spa: User Creates a New Note
    activate spa
    spa->>spa: Save New Note
    spa->>server: POST New Note Data
    activate server
    server-->>spa: Note Successfully Created
    deactivate server
    spa->>browser: Update Notes in SPA
    deactivate spa

    browser->>spa: User Initiates Notes Update
    activate spa
    spa->>server: GET Updated Notes
    activate server
    server-->>spa: Updated Notes Data
    deactivate server
    spa->>browser: Update Notes in SPA
    deactivate spa

sequenceDiagram
    participant B as Browser
    participant D as SPA
    participant E as User Interaction
    participant G as Save in SPA
    participant H as Send to Server
    participant I as Process on Server
    participant J as Server Response
    participant K as Update SPA

    B->>C: SPA URL: https://exampleapp.com/spa
    B->>D: SPA
    D->>E: User Interaction
    E->>F: Create New Note
    F->>G: Save Note in SPA
    G->>H: Send Note to Server
    H->>I: Process Note on Server
    I->>J: Server Response
    J->>K: Update SPA
    K->>L: User Sees the Created Note
    L->>M: Finish

graph TD
    A[Usuario] --> B[Navegador Web]
    B --> C[SPA URL: https://exampleapp.com/spa]
    B --> D[SPA]
    D --> E[InteracciÃ³n de Usuario]
    E --> F[Crear Nueva Nota]
    F --> G[Guardar Nota en la SPA]
    G --> H[Enviar Nota al Servidor]
    H --> I[Procesar Nota en el Servidor]
    I --> J[Respuesta del Servidor]
    J --> K[Actualizar la SPA]
    K --> L[Usuario ve la Nota Creada]
    L --> M[Fin]

graph TD
    subgraph User
        A[User] --> B[Accesses Web Browser]
    end

    subgraph Application
        C[SPA URL: https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa] --> D[SPA]
    end

    subgraph Interaction
        B --> D
        D --> E[User Interaction]
        D --> F[Server Communication]
    end

    subgraph Server
        F --> G[Server]
        G --> H[Server Response]
        H --> F
    end

User --(Accesses Web Browser)--> Accesses Web Browser
Accesses Web Browser --(Opens SPA URL: https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa)--> SPA
Accesses Web Browser --(SPA)--> User Interaction
SPA --(User Interaction)--> Server Communication
Server Communication --(Server)--> Server Response
Server Response --(Server Response)--> Server Communication
User Interaction --(User Interaction)--> SPA

1. [User] --> 2. [Accesses Web Browser]
3. [Accesses Web Browser] --> 4. [Opens SPA URL: https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/spa]
5. [Accesses Web Browser] --> 6. [SPA]
6. --> 7. [User Interaction]
6. --> 8. [Server Communication]
8. --> 9. [Server]
9. --> 10. [Server Response]
10. --> 8
7. --> 6
